title: cryptoknightt
author: cryptoknightt
content: Why do so many people learn XRP coins?Especially their problems in America. How do you respond to XRP, is there a bright spot in the future?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoknightt on March 05, 2023, 07:32:19 PMWhy do so many people learn XRP coins?Are there other coins aside from XRP for being in itself? or you're asking about XRP alone? If so, IMHO, because it's probably a centralized coin that's being marketed attached to banks and other remittance companies.Quote from: cryptoknightt on March 05, 2023, 07:32:19 PMEspecially their problems in America. How do you respond to XRP, is there a bright spot in the future?It is passed with its ATH and it didn't move up a lot with the last bull run. Those that are actual holders of it would say that there is still a bright future for it. But for someone who just speculates on it and doesn't hold it, I'd say that if there's some chance it will be just a very little chance to see it go ahead on its way to the top. Because there are still a lot of people that use it for transfers and how like the cheap fees and speed of it in respect of its usage.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: None whatsoever. People who go into XRP have no idea how the background of it works, if they knew exactly how it works then they would not invest into it at all, and if somehow they do know about it and STILL invest, then they are terrible investors.People all around the world and all around online media warned everyone that it's not really a coin or a token, it's basically a way that one company moves money from one place to another and nothing more, and it makes the company richer, not you.
